entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late this evening then changing to periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain showers near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 14 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to 14 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
